data.oai_dc:dc: Nutrient concentrations in water samples from the Aegean Sea at Station MAY-1997-IR92

Aegaeo, Calculated, Calculated, in situ oxygen concentration and in situ oxygen saturation, CTD/Rosette, CTD-RO, DEPTH, water, Determination of nitrite (Bendschneider & Robinson, 1952, J Mar Res, 11:87-96), Determination of phosphate (Murphy & Riley, 1962), Dissolved oxygen with modified Winkler (Carpenter, 1965), Dissolved silica, colorimetric (Mullin & Riley, 1955), INTERREG, Invest. of new marine biol. resources in deep waters of Ionian and Aegean Seas, IR92, MAY-1997, MAY-1997-IR92, Nitrate, Nitrite, Oxygen, Oxygen, apparent utilization, Oxygen saturation, Phosphate, Seawater analysis (Strickland & Parsons, 1968), Silicate
